Course Description: THIS COURSE IS AN IN-DEPTH EXAMINATION OF FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING AND REPORTING.  SPECIFIC TOPICS INCLUDE THE ACCOUNTING PROCEDURES AND FINANCIAL STATEMENT PRESENTATION OF CURRENT AND LONG-TERM LIABILITIES, CONTINGENCIES, INVESTMENTS IN DEBT AND EQUITY SECURITIES, CONTRIBUTED CAPITAL, EARNINGS PER SHARE, RETAINED EARNINGS, LEASES, INCOME RECOGNITION, AND MEASUREMENT OF NET ASSETS.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
